ygData.subject: Re: Bard Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The predator is a semi-rare spawn, and the shard is a rare drop.  A friend of mine camped it for several hours a day for a week before getting his shard.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> I was gonna buy an obsidian shard until I got one for myself the other day.
> Several people I talked with in game told me they go for 500-600PP. If you
> want to get one for yourself, I would guess you would need a full party in
> their mid 20s. The kobold predator (as well as the goblin foreman who drops
> the obsidian scimitar) was blue to me at 32d level. All other stuff that

The predator is a semi-rare spawn, and the shard is a rare
drop. A friend of mine camped it for several hours a day for
a week before getting his shard. Thus the high price.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
